description.plain:
David Adedeji Adeleke, known by his stage name Davido, is an award winning American-born Nigerian recording artist, performer and record producer. Born in Atlanta, Georgia and raised in Lagos, Nigeria, Davido initially garnered attention with the release of his 2011 track, “Dami Duro”.

Davido is the co-owner of HKN Music, a record label home to aritsts Sina Rambo, B. Red and DeeKay.

Born: November 21, 1992

description.plain:
“If” can be described as a love-themed ballad, with a blend of Afrobeats and R&B.
On this track, Davido confronts his feelings for a special lady ad serenades her with words of appreciation and pledges of commitment.

It debuted at number 1 on the Nigerian iTunes and continued to lead the chart for weeks and across the land. It was the most played song on radio for week 13 of 2017.

Interestingly the track was produced by the talented Tekno who many at the time would consider his biggest competition for the chart.

“If” is Davido’s first single of the year 2017 and one of his biggest success yet, It’s also his most viewed track here on genius.
An official music video directed by Q was released on Feburary 17, 2017.

description.plain:
On “Fall” Davido expresses his feelings for a lady by showering her with praises of worthiness and wealth in the form of i.e food, money, clothing and stardom. He also confesses his intent to change from his old playboy lifestyle just to be with her.

An official music video starring Davido was released on 2nd June 2017. In it, Davido finds himself in the company of a lady who he’s no longer interested in while having fantasies of being with another, serenading and gracing the dance floor together.

The song debuted at No.1 on the Nigerian singles chart. It became the second single to do so by Davido in 2017 after the great success of “IF”.

description.plain:
This one’s a third, off the Son Of Mercy EP Album.

Davido remarkably exhibits more of his rap versatility in this song as he features the Durban’s Coolest Kid, Nasty C on this fusion of Hip-Hop/Trap sound, who intricately graced through his verse with his resounding rap style.
This would be their second collaboration on a track.

Here’s a David’s song of re-assertion with recounts of why and how much of a Coolest Kid he is in Africa.

description.plain:
“Pere” is a single by Nigerian rapper Davido. The rapper enlists three high-profile features in fellow Atlanta native Young Thug and in the two star brothers Rae Sremmurd.

The song sees Davido mixing rap and afrobeats, backed by a fitting production handled by Mustard.

“Pere” is most likely a Nigerian slang meaning “sex.” On the song, all four rappers elaborate on how they seduce girls, the intercourse being a big part of their relationships.

description.plain: The weaknesses begin to reveal themselves on the R&B-infused gbedu ‘D&G’ which features Summer Walker. The song is really good and those London On The Track-produced guitar chords are beautiful. But on a 17-track album, it’s around track six that you start getting antsy and expectant of something mind-blowing, but it never quite came.

description.plain:
This is the official remix to Davido’s smash single “If” released in February 2017. He features American R&B superstar R. Kelly and both artists sing about the pursuit of their respective girls and make promises over this Tekno produced beat and Lil Jon vocals sample.

Davido teased the remix in an Instagram post in May 2017 featuring R. Kelly’s verse.

description.plain:
Dami Duro is the second single from Davido’s debut album. The song was a big hit, peaking at number one GoldMyne’s top 10 songs of 2012 list, surpassing Iyanya’s “Kukere” and winning various awards.

Dami Duro translates to “Stop Me”. In the song Davido brags about himself and his fathers wealth. He also sings about how no one will be able to stop him from his rise in the music industry no matter how much they may want to.

description.plain:
The Fifth track and yet, another official single off the Extended Play Son Of Mercy.

Davido, who inked a record deal with Sony’s RCA Records over the summer features a renowned Label-mate, Tinashe who effortlessly vibes along with her mellifluous voice on this catchy Afro-pop tune.

This romantic sexy-loving song is their first collaboration on a record.

description.plain:
Multiple award-winning, Popstar, Davido ends the year in a grand style with something special, dedicated to women globally. The Nigerian hitmaker has had a phenomenal run with a seemingly endless array of hits in one of the most impressive musical career runs witnessed by an African Act. The song’s dedication rather than focus on a single woman



 is a celebration of the women in Davido’s life. Being a father to two daughters by different mothers as well as a girlfriend in that equation, its safe to say his appraisal of the fairer sex is well merited

description.plain:
Here, a second track off the Son Of Mercy EP.
Davido collaborates with Simi, the super-fine vocalist on this romantic duet: a groovy Afro-Highlife/Ragga fusion; whilst he blends and delivered well, the latter gracefully blessed the tune with her nostalgic voice.

description.plain:
“2020 Letter To You” is Davido’s first single of the year 2020. It follows with the release of his 2nd studio album ‘A Good Time‘ which is still gaining huge listens on streaming platforms. The pop star yesterday shared a snippet his Instagram account of his 2020 official new year single for his music fans and loved ones.
https://www.instagram.com/p/B7gWViUhaUH/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link
Davido is passing a message to everyone about; ”living a good life”, ”staying away from hate by loving one another”. And making quality use of your time this new year with this song.

The snippet was shared in the short video posted by Davido, shot by Mr Layii which sees the pop star having fun with everyone while vibing to the new forthcoming inspirational song.

https://xclusiveloaded.com/davido-2020-letter-to-you-song/

description.plain:
Back then in 2011, one of the upcoming artistes that came to limelight is Davido and with the assistance of one the raving artistes at that time – Naeto C, the then-young superstar released his debut single which he titled “Back When”.

Off Davido debut project “Omo Baba Olowo Album”, Back When serves as track 2 Off the exceptional Album.

Davido has come this far and we can all see the fruit of his Hard work. The ever consistent hit maker never seize to amaze his fans.

The talented Legendary superstar has since dropped mega hit songs such as Dami Duro, Owo Ni Koko, Gobe, Dodo, IF and the recent buzzing International collaboration with American superstar Chris Brown – Blow My Mind.
